edu.thu.keg.mdap.datamodel

Class SimpleQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.thu.keg.mdap.datamodel.SimpleQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataContent, Query

    public class SimpleQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
    Simple implementation of the Query interface. Only a wrapper around plain SQL query.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma
